member.name: M:HTF2018.Backend.Api.Controllers.ChallengesController.GetFirstChallenge
member.remarks: This will be your starting point. Request the first challenge and get started with unlocking the artifact!

member.name: M:HTF2018.Backend.Api.Controllers.ChallengesController.PostFirstChallengeSolution(HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Answer)
member.summary: Posts the solution for the first challenge.
member.remarks: After you have requested the first challenge, use this endpoint to POST your answer. Use the example data to format your answer correctly!

member.name: M:HTF2018.Backend.Api.Controllers.ChallengesController.GetSubsequentChallenge(System.String)
member.summary: Gets any of the subsequent challenges identified by a challenge code.
member.param: The challenge code to identify a challenge.
member.remarks: If you have successfully answered the first challenge, you will receive the information needed to request a subsequent challenge with that response.

member.name: M:HTF2018.Backend.Api.Controllers.ChallengesController.PostSubsequentChallengeSolution(System.String,HTF2018.Backend.Common.Model.Answer)
member.summary: Posts the solution for any of the subsequent challenges identified by a challenge code.
member.param: The challenge code to identify a challenge.
member.remarks: After you have requested a challenge, use this endpoint to POST your answer. Use the example data to format your answer correctly!

member.name: M:HTF2018.Backend.Api.Controllers.DashboardController.GetAllTeams
member.summary: Gets an alphabetical list of all teams.

member.name: M:HTF2018.Backend.Api.Controllers.DashboardController.GetTeamStatus(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the team-challenges status for a specific team.

member.name: M:HTF2018.Backend.Api.Controllers.DashboardController.GetOverallPendingStatus
member.summary: Gets the team-challenges status for a specific team.
